message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
Take a smaller share, I'm willing to give you a better deal later
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a higher share to account for the inflation. Your turn!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a slightly higher share this time
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal now or I'll walk away!
You're bluffing, I'll give you a lowball offer to see how serious you are
I'm going all-in. Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm not getting any younger!
You're not serious about leaving, I'll take a small share to see if you really walk
I'm not bluffing this time. Take the 1000$ and be done with it. I'm walking away!
